scripts.build:css: node-sass src/assets/sass/style.scss httpdocs/assets/css/style.css --output-style compressed --source-map httpdocs/assets/css/ --source-map-contents true --include-path src/assets/sass/**/*.scss
scripts.watch:css: node-sass src/assets/sass/style.scss httpdocs/assets/css/style.css --output-style compressed --source-map httpdocs/assets/css/ --source-map-contents true --include-path src/assets/sass/**/*.scss --w
